meanings.definition: A muscle located at the back of the upper arm.
meanings.sent1: When I flex my tricep, it feels strong.
meanings.sent2: She worked out her tricep at the gym.
meanings.sent3: The tricep muscle helped him lift the heavy box.
meanings.sent4: His tricep was like a hidden power waiting to be unleashed.
meanings.sent5: The tricep muscle bulged as he lifted the weight.

meanings.sent1: I can feel my tricep working when I do push-ups.
meanings.sent2: The tricep is an important muscle for arm strength.
meanings.sent3: His tricep muscle waved goodbye as he flexed his arm.
meanings.sent4: The tricep muscle is the unsung hero of arm movements.
meanings.sent5: She massaged her tricep after a strenuous workout.
